023
024package org.opt4j.operators.mutate;
025
026import org.opt4j.core.config.Icons;
027import org.opt4j.core.config.annotations.Icon;
028import org.opt4j.operators.OperatorModule;
029
030import com.google.inject.TypeLiteral;
031
032/**
033 * The {@link MutateModule} is used for modules for the {@link Mutate} operator.
034 * 
035 * A new {@link Mutate} operator can be registered by implementing this module
036 * and adding the operator with {@link #addOperator}.
037 * 
038 * @author lukasiewycz
039 * @see Mutate
040 * 
041 */
042@Icon(Icons.OPERATOR)
043public abstract class MutateModule extends OperatorModule<Mutate<?>> {
044
045        /*
046         * (non-Javadoc)
047         * 
048         * @see org.opt4j.operator.OperatorModule#getOperatorTypeLiteral()
049         */
050        @Override
051        protected TypeLiteral<Mutate<?>> getOperatorTypeLiteral() {
052                return new TypeLiteral<Mutate<?>>() {
053                };
054        }
055
056}
